critique: This document is an executive order that exempts Alvin M. Rankin from compulsory retirement for one year. It is a very specific action related to one individual. There is no clear indication of broad ideological leaning, immigration policy, or impact on civil liberties. It has a very slight impact on executive power, as it is an executive order, but it is a very minor action. It does not obviously affect federalism, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most scores should be neutral.
